name: Crab Battler 2
description:
Embark on a  text adventure  filled with ASCII art and animations! You are a small cave nymph on a mission to stop  the crustacean invasion that threatens your fairy homeland. Explore the island's randomly generated maps and drive the crabs out by challenging them in demanding turn-based battles. Interact with your environment and the characters you meet to obtain randomized loot, upgrade your skills and equipment, and ultimately learn the truth behind the march of the crabs.

Featuring an original soundtrack  by music producer Ben Quadnozzles with  over 70 compositions in styles ranging from minimalist techno to explosive hip hop beats.

This project is very much a work in progress, and some features are sure to be broken or incomplete. It may be best to think of it as a fully-featured demo in the game's current state, but the build posted here is completely playable and in active development.

You can find more gameplay videos and information on Crab Battler 2's Twitter page, and I've put together a playlist of short videos showing off some of the game's features and music on YouTube.
